column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Think Like a Businessman
#Text=We all need to do to business at some point in life , whether it 's a small trade or a huge business one .

#Text=It is important to think like a businessman for many reasons like to avoid fraud , earn a little cash , or stay out of debt , and this article will teach you how to think like a real businessman !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Do cost benefits analysis of things .
#Text=this is the basis of most profitable decisions .
#Text=here you are weighing up what you expect to lose in comparison to what you expect to gain and what benefits you will get from taking certain pathways .
#Text=Figure out the usefulness and benefit of products .
#Text=usefulness and benefit of things often transcribe to whether or not the product is sell-able .
#Text=when you analyse things look to see how much use it provides .
#Text=Have a vision .
#Text=A vision of what you aim to create is what draws people to you and inspires others to your cause .
#Text=A good vision will gain you many supporters and investors .
#Text=it is useful to look at the visions of others to determine which visions are worthwhile .
#Text=Value your time .
#Text=Time is something you never get back and valuing it makes you spend it well .
#Text=Old age and death creep up on people before they are aware and they live with lots of regrets .
#Text=managing your time well also makes people respect you .
#Text=Look to see how you can best organise people .
#Text=The organisation of people for a purpose is the fundamental aspect of a company .
#Text=if you can organise people for a reason you can form a company and begin .
#Text=Pay attention to where things are going to waste .
#Text=A sense of wastefulness is paramount to reorganising your resources in a way that is best for you .
#Text=If you have no sense of where things are going to waste then you will dwindle accumulated wealth little by little .
#Text=Look at what is going to waste - energy , time , resources , skills and then find ways to use them .
#Text=Pay attention to innovative ideas and methods .
#Text=In this way , you develop a means to do things in ways that are more efficient .

#Text=many people have it in their heads that the only way to do things is the way that it has been done for a long time , however , this is not based in reality and can be very time consuming for little reward .
#Text=Tips
#Text=If you 're not sure whether a trade is good or not
#Text=be sure to ask a friend or family member to avoid getting ripped off !
#Text=Warnings
#Text=If you are n't careful you may lose a lot of cash and/or items !
#Text=Do NOT make illegal trades/business deals !
#Text=You may not start thinking like one right away , but remember practice makes perfect !
